title: East Harlem Giglio Festival
address: Pleasant Avenue between 114th + 116th Streets, East Harlem

title: Ghirardelli Chocolate Empire State Building Grand Opening
description: Ribbon cutting with Mary J. Blidge, free hot fudge sundaes for the first 102 guests, $5 mini sundaes from 2-6pm.

title: Free Pizza
description: Free pizza at East Village Pizza (mention codeword ‘evp’).

title: Holy Rosary Church's Annual La Festa Italiana
Dancing Around the World’s Boro
description: Open dance classes taught by a diverse range of Queens-based dance groups as part of the annual Queensboro Dance Festival.

title: Third Annual Lincoln Center's Summer for the City
description: 200+ free or choose-what-you-pay concerts, dance parties, performances, film screenings, and more through August.

title: Caregivers
description: Award-winning storytellers Erin Barker and Jeff Simmermon perform solo shows about their relationships with their parents.

title: Live at the Gantries
description: Annual outdoor concert series at Gantry Plaza State Park featuring Sunny Jain’s Wild Wild East.

title: Naumburg Orchestral Concerts
description: Outdoor orchestral concerts at Central Park's historic Naumburg Bandshell featuring Acronym Baroque Music Ensemble.

title: Cherry on Top Comedy
description: Stand-up comedy show in an ice cream shop featuring a female, queer, and non-binary lineup.

title: Drenched Stand Up Comedy
description: Comedy show at Arlo Nomad's Mirror Bar featuring various comedians.
